text: Conticosta is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Conticosta include: * Conticosta petilinus (Hedley, 1922) ==References== ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Pseudomelatomidae Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Conticosta
